activities: Casual Male receives customer information from the EU for marketing purposes of targeting direct mail and e-mail, determine effectiveness of internet preferences, improve our merchandising selections and overall shopping experience.  Casual Male receives employee data from the EU for the purpose of providing employee benefits and services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Casual Male agrees to cooperate with JAMs.  Casual Male agrees to cooperate with the EU Data Protection Authorities with respect to employee data.
